nodes.name: Tusks I
nodes.description: tusks unlock; required for charge line

nodes.name: Tidewake Charge
nodes.description: charge attack with clean trail (gated by tusks_t1)

nodes.name: Driftbreaker Crown
nodes.description: ornate tusks + heavy stomp VFX (no noise)

nodes.name: Brine Fur Highlights
nodes.description: sea-salt fur highlights; rage ring enabled

nodes.name: Tide Rage Ring
nodes.description: rage aura becomes swirling tide ring

nodes.name: Brine Brawler Form
nodes.description: bulk grows; stomp splash; anti-humanoid lock

nodes.name: Thorn Bloom
nodes.description: flowers bloom; heal pulse when struck

nodes.name: Reef Growth
nodes.description: coral growth on back; summon pod

nodes.name: Tidecap Overbloom
nodes.description: cap becomes iconic; bigger spore ring

nodes.name: War Paint Marks
nodes.description: damage boost after kill; visible glow

nodes.name: Boulder Toss
nodes.description: throws heavy projectile with crater VFX

nodes.name: Fortify Mode
nodes.description: tuck into shell; aura shield expands

nodes.name: Banner Mast
nodes.description: team buff aura; flag on shell

nodes.name: Ink Burst
nodes.description: dark splash cloud blocks vision briefly
